Current release doesn't test under MAC OS.
I'll talk with PMC about the schedule to support MAC OS.
Thanks
When is it planned that BIRT will work on OS X?

Hi Alastair: BIRT release 1.0 probably did not suppport Mac OS X, so I strongly recommond you take the latest BIRT release(2.1.0 currently) to have a try, and see if the same errors happen as you described in this bug.
Certainly, it had better to do it with the latest Eclipse SDK, emf and GEF too.

Thanks, and looking forward to your response.

I haved tried to run the latest Birt (current release is 2.1.0) in the environment:
- Mac OS X 10.4.6
- eclipse-SDK-3.2-macosx-carbon (Build ID: M20060629-1905)
- emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.2.0.zip
- GEF-ALL-3.2

And Birt doesn't show the error as described in this bug report, changed the resolution as "works for me".
